import React, { createRef, useRef, useState } from "react"; import { Link, useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; import '../css/nav.css' function Nav() { const [isOpen, setIsopen] = useState(false) const expandref = useRef() const color = localStorage.getItem('color') const Expand = () => { if(isOpen){ expandref.current.style.left = '0' setIsopen(true) } } return ( <>
